ADDUPDATEDEPARTMENTMODAL.toastr.addDepartment.error.message: Department of {{departmentName}} is not added successfully.
ADDUPDATEDEPARTMENTMODAL.toastr.updateDepartment.success.message: Department with id {{departmentId}} is updated as {{departmentName}} successfully.
ADDUPDATEDEPARTMENTMODAL.toastr.updateDepartment.error.message: Department with id {{departmentId}} is not updated as {{departmentName}} successfully.

DELETECONFIRMATIONMODAL.header.title: Delete Department Confirmation
DELETECONFIRMATIONMODAL.warningMessage: Do you want to delete Department of {{departmentName}} with id {{departmentId}} from database?
DELETECONFIRMATIONMODAL.toastr.deleteDepartment.success.message: Department of {{departmentName}} with id {{departmentId}} is deleted.
DELETECONFIRMATIONMODAL.toastr.deleteDepartment.error.message: Department of {{departmentName}} with id {{departmentId}} is not deleted.
DELETECONFIRMATIONMODAL.toastr.deleteDepartment.error.constraint: Department of {{departmentName}} with id {{departmentId}} is not deleted because of there were registered staffs.
